description: This file defines the IProfileService interface, which declares methods related to user profile operations such as retrieving, updating, and searching profiles in the application.

classes.name: IProfileService
classes.description: Interface for profile-related services including get, update, and search operations.

methods.name: GetMyProfileAsync
methods.description: Retrieves the profile of the user with the specified userId asynchronously.

methods.name: UpdateMyProfileAsync
methods.description: Updates the profile of the user with the specified userId using the provided request data asynchronously.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves the profile of the user with the specified userId, possibly returning null if not found.

methods.name: SearchAsync
methods.description: Searches for users matching the query string, returning a list of UserSummary objects with support for pagination.
